verses.verse: וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <WH5066> came near כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> Then all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֔ים <WH2428> of the forces וְיֽוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3110> and Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וִֽיזַנְיָ֖ה <WH3153> and Jezaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הוֹשַֽׁעְיָ֑ה <WH1955> of Hoshaiah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people מִקָּטֹ֥ן <WH6996> from the least וְעַד־ <WH5704> against גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> even unto the greatest

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> And said אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> unto Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> the prophet תִּפָּל־ <WH5307> be accepted נָ֤א <WH4994> Please תְחִנָּתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH8467> Let we beseech thee our supplication לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before וְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <WH6419> thee and pray בַּעֲדֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH5704> us אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> for us unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּעַ֖ד <WH1157> about כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הַשְּׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> [even] for all this remnant הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נִשְׁאַ֤רְנוּ <WH7604> (for we are left מְעַט֙ <WH4592> [but] a few מֵֽהַרְבֵּ֔ה <WH7235> of many כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> your עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> as thine eyes רֹא֥וֹת <WH7200> do behold אֹתָֽנוּ׃ <WH853>

וְיַגֶּד־ <WH5046> may shew לָ֙נוּ֙ יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> us the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נֵֽלֶךְ־ <WH1980> walk בָּ֑הּ וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> and the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> that we may do

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> then יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <WH3414> Then Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <WH8085> unto them I have heard הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> I am going מִתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <WH6419> [you] behold I will pray אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God כְּדִבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1697> according to your words וְֽהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> become כָּֽל־ <WH3605> the whole הַדָּבָר֩ <WH1697> and it shall come to pass [that] whatsoever thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַעֲנֶ֨ה <WH6030> shall answer יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> you I will declare לָכֶ֔ם לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶמְנַ֥ע <WH4513> back מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> at דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> nothing

וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> they אָמְר֣וּ <WH559> Then they said אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> to Jeremiah יְהִ֤י <WH1961> become יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD בָּ֔נוּ לְעֵ֖ד <WH5707> witness אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> be a true וְנֶאֱמָ֑ן <WH539> and faithful אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֡א <WH3808> not כְּֽכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הַ֠דָּבָר <WH1697> not even according to all things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֜ <WH7971> shall send יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> for the which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> about כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> not נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> between us if we do

אִם־ <WH518> Whether ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Whether [it be] good וְאִם־ <WH518> or רָ֔ע <WH7451> or whether [it be] evil בְּק֣וֹל ׀ <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom [אֲנוּ כ] (אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <WH580> we ק) שֹׁלְחִ֥ים <WH7971> send אֹתְךָ֛ <WH853> אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about נִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> we will obey לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> so אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to whom יִֽיטַב־ <WH3190> thee that it may be well לָ֔נוּ כִּ֣י <WH3588> when נִשְׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> with us when we obey בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God ס

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> And it came to pass after עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> ten יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH3414> came unto Jeremiah

וַיִּקְרָ֗א <WH7121> Then called אֶל־ <WH413> about יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3110> he Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וְאֶ֛ל <WH413> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <WH2428> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וּלְכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> and for all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> which [were] with him and all the people לְמִקָּטֹ֥ן <WH6996> from the least וְעַד־ <WH5704> against גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> even to the greatest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom שְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם <WH7971> unto whom ye sent אֹתִי֙ <WH853> אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to לְהַפִּ֥יל <WH5307> me to present תְּחִנַּתְכֶ֖ם <WH8467> your supplication לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

אִם־ <WH518> If שׁ֤וֹב <WH7725> If ye will still תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> abide בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> I וּבָנִ֤יתִי <WH1129> then will I build אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not אֶהֱרֹ֔ס <WH2040> you and not pull [you] down וְנָטַעְתִּ֥י <WH5193> and I will plant אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not אֶתּ֑וֹשׁ <WH5428> you and not pluck [you] up כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִחַ֙מְתִּי֙ <WH5162> for I repent אֶל־ <WH413> concerning הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> me of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> that I have done לָכֶֽם׃

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֗וּ <WH3372> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> of מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> ye יְרֵאִ֖ים <WH3373> ye are afraid מִפָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> of whom אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <WH3372> be not afraid מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> of him' נְאֻם־ <WH5002> of him saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִתְּכֶ֣ם <WH854> for אָ֔נִי <WH589> I לְהוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <WH3467> for I [am] with you to save אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> וּלְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> you and to deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> you from his hand

וְאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> And I will shew לָכֶ֛ם רַחֲמִ֖ים <WH7356> mercies וְרִחַ֣ם <WH7355> unto you that he may have mercy אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וְהֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> upon you and cause you to return אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to אַדְמַתְכֶֽם׃ <WH127> to your own land

וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> But if ye say אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you לֹ֥א <WH3808> We will not נֵשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> We will not dwell בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> not שְׁמֹ֔עַ <WH8085> neither obey בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> Saying לֹ֚א <WH3808> No כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> into the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt נָב֔וֹא <WH935> No but we will go אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> where לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No נִרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> where we shall see מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> no war וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> the sound שׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> of the trumpet לֹ֣א <WH3808> No נִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> nor hear וְלַלֶּ֥חֶם <WH3899> of bread לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No נִרְעָ֖ב <WH7456> nor have hunger וְשָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there נֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> and there will we dwell

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> henceforth לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> case שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> And now therefore hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> ye remnant יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אִם־ <WH518> If אַ֠תֶּם <WH859> you שׂ֣וֹם <WH7760> If ye wholly תְּשִׂמ֤וּן <WH7760> set פְּנֵיכֶם֙ <WH6440> your faces לָבֹ֣א <WH935> to enter מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וּבָאתֶ֖ם <WH935> and go לָג֥וּר <WH1481> to sojourn שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> then הַחֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> Then it shall come to pass [that] the sword אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you יְרֵאִ֣ים <WH3372> are afraid מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> at שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there תַּשִּׂ֥יג <WH5381> shall overtake אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> you there in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהָרָעָ֞ב <WH7458> and the famine אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתֶּ֣ם ׀ <WH859> you דֹּאֲגִ֣ים <WH1672> whereof ye were afraid מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> at שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there יִדְבַּ֧ק <WH1692> shall follow close אַחֲרֵיכֶ֛ם <WH310> after מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> you there in Egypt וְשָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there תָּמֻֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> and there ye shall die

וְיִֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> will have כָל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׂ֨מוּ <WH7760> that set אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵיהֶ֜ם <WH6440> their faces לָב֤וֹא <WH935> to go מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> into Egypt לָג֣וּר <WH1481> to sojourn שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there יָמ֕וּתוּ <WH4191> there they shall die בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> and by the pestilence וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> will have לָהֶם֙ שָׂרִ֣יד <WH8300> and none of them shall remain וּפָלִ֔יט <WH6412> or escape מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> from הָֽרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> that I will bring עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֜ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֮ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after נִתַּ֨ךְ <WH5413> hath been poured forth אַפִּ֜י <WH639> As mine anger וַחֲמָתִ֗י <WH2534> and my fury עַל־ <WH5921> on יֹֽשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> upon the inhabitants יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so תִּתַּ֤ךְ <WH5413> be poured forth חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> so shall my fury עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> on בְּבֹאֲכֶ֖ם <WH935> upon you when ye shall enter מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וִהְיִיתֶ֞ם <WH1961> will become לְאָלָ֤ה <WH423> and ye shall be an execration וּלְשַׁמָּה֙ <WH8047> and an astonishment וְלִקְלָלָ֣ה <WH7045> and a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <WH2781> and a reproach וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> and ye shall see ע֔וֹד <WH5750> more אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> unto שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> concerning you O ye remnant יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אַל־ <WH408> not תָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> Go מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> ye not into Egypt יָדֹ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> know תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> certainly כִּי־ <WH3588> for הַעִידֹ֥תִי <WH5749> that I have admonished בָכֶ֖ם הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> you this day
